description: Bitcoin has plunged below $100,000 amid fading Fed rate-cut hopes, institutional pullback, and tech sector woes, erasing $450 billion in market value. title: Bitcoin Whales Are Accumulating: What Does It Mean for Price?
description: Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) whales started accumulating again after the latest market correction.
